subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Fiji threatened to pull off the biggest shocker in the history of World Cup rugby before falling to South Africa, 37-20, in Paris. Fiji came back from a 20-6 deficit to tie the score at 20-20 with 20 minutes to go. But South Africa scored two late tries.
